parts.text: Design a scalable e-commerce platform architecture

Here's a scalable e-commerce platform architecture: 1) Frontend: React/Next.js with CDN distribution for global performance. 2) API Gateway: Kong or AWS API Gateway for request routing and rate limiting. 3) Microservices: Product catalog, user management, order processing, payment, and inventory services. 4) Database: PostgreSQL for transactional data, MongoDB for product catalog, Redis for caching and sessions. 5) Message Queue: RabbitMQ or Kafka for asynchronous processing. 6) Container Orchestration: Kubernetes for service deployment and scaling. 7) Monitoring: Prometheus, Grafana, and ELK stack for observability. This architecture supports horizontal scaling, fault tolerance, and can handle millions of users.
